Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.projects

Class ProjectSamplesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.projects.ProjectSamplesController
  • @Controller
public class ProjectSamplesController
extends Object
    Controller for handling interactions with samples in a project

      • getProjectSamplesPage

        @RequestMapping({"/projects/{projectId}","/projects/{projectId}/samples","/projects/{projectId}/add-sample*/**","/projects/{projectId}/samples/add-sample*/**"})
public String getProjectSamplesPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                    Principal principal,
                                    @PathVariable
                                    long projectId)
        Get the samples for a given project
        Parameters:
        model - A model for the sample list view
        principal - The user reading the project
        projectId - The ID of the project
        Returns:
        Name of the project samples list view

      • getShareSamplesModal

        @PostMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/templates/copy-move-modal",
             produces="text/html")
public String getShareSamplesModal​(@RequestParam(name="sampleIds[]")
                                   List<Long> ids,
                                   @PathVariable
                                   Long projectId,
                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                   boolean move)
        Create a modal dialogue for moving or sharing Sample to another Project
        Parameters:
        ids - List of identifiers for Samples to copy or move.
        projectId - Identifier for the current Project
        model - UI Model
        move - Whether or not to display share or move wording.
        Returns:
        Path to share or move modal template.

      • getProjectSamplesFilterModal

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/template/samples-filter-modal",
                produces="text/html")
public String getProjectSamplesFilterModal​(@PathVariable
                                           Long projectId,
                                           @RequestParam(required=false,name="associated[]",defaultValue="")
                                           List<Long> associated,
                                           UISampleFilter filter,
                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)

        Parameters:
        projectId - Long identifier for the current Project
        associated - Which associated projects are enabled
        filter - UISampleFilter Current filter parameters.
        model - UI Model

      • getSampleNamesNotInProject

        @RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples/missing")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> getSampleNamesNotInProject​(@PathVariable
                                                           Long projectId,
                                                           @RequestParam(value="projects[]",defaultValue="")
                                                           List<Long> projects,
                                                           @RequestParam("sampleNames[]")
                                                           List<String> sampleNames,
                                                           Locale locale)
        Get a listing of sample names not found in the current project based on a list.
        Parameters:
        projectId - Project identifier for project
        sampleNames - List of sample names
        projects - List of associated Project identifiers
        locale - Locale local of current user
        Returns:
        Map of Samples not in the current project

      • getProjectSamples

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples",
                produces="application/json",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public DataTablesResponse getProjectSamples​(@PathVariable
                                            Long projectId,
                                            @DataTablesRequest
                                            DataTablesParams params,
                                            @RequestParam(required=false,name="sampleNames[]",defaultValue="")
                                            List<String> sampleNames,
                                            @RequestParam(required=false,name="associated[]",defaultValue="")
                                            List<Long> associated,
                                            UISampleFilter filter,
                                            Locale locale)
        Generate the Samples for the Project table based on the filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        projectId - identifier for the current Project
        params - for the current DataTable.
        sampleNames - List of Sample names to filter by.
        associated - List of associated Project identifiers currently displayed in the table.
        filter - for specific Sample attributes.
        locale - for the current user.
        Returns:
        DTProjectSamples that meet the requirements

      • getAllProjectSampleIds

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/ajax/sampleIds",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public List<ProjectCartSample> getAllProjectSampleIds​(@PathVariable
                                                      Long projectId,
                                                      @DataTablesRequest
                                                      DataTablesParams params,
                                                      @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="",value="sampleNames[]")
                                                      List<String> sampleNames,
                                                      @RequestParam(value="associated[]",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                      List<Long> associatedProjectIds,
                                                      @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                      String search,
                                                      UISampleFilter filter)
        Get a minimum representation of all Sample ids in a Project
        Parameters:
        projectId - Identifier for the current project
        params - DataTablesParams
        sampleNames - List of sample names that the Project Samples is currently filtered by.
        associatedProjectIds - List of associated Project identifiers
        search - The global filter for the table
        filter - The specific attribute filters applied to the table.
        Returns:
        Map of Project identifiers and associated Sample identifiers available.

      • getProjectsAvailableToCopySamples

        @RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples/available_projects")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> getProjectsAvailableToCopySamples​(@PathVariable
                                                                  Long projectId,
                                                                  @RequestParam
                                                                  String term,
                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="10")
                                                                  int pageSize,
                                                                  @RequestParam
                                                                  int page)
        Search for projects available for a user to copy samples to. If the user is an admin it will show all projects.
        Parameters:
        projectId - identifier for the current Project
        term - A search term
        pageSize - The size of the page requests
        page - The page number (0 based)
        Returns:
        a Map<String,Object> containing: total: total number of elements results: A Map<Long,String> of project IDs and project names.

      • shareSampleToProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples/copy",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> shareSampleToProject​(@PathVariable
                                                     Long projectId,
                                                     @RequestParam("sampleIds[]")
                                                     List<Long> sampleIds,
                                                     @RequestParam
                                                     Long newProjectId,
                                                     @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                     boolean remove,
                                                     @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                     boolean giveOwner,
                                                     Locale locale)
        Share or move samples from one project to another
        Parameters:
        projectId - The original project id
        sampleIds - the sample identifiers to share
        newProjectId - The new project id
        remove - true/false whether to remove the samples from the original project
        giveOwner - whether to give ownership of the sample to the new project
        locale - the locale specified by the browser.
        Returns:
        A list of warnings

      • deleteProjectSamples

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples/delete",
                produces="application/json",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> deleteProjectSamples​(@PathVariable
                                                     Long projectId,
                                                     @RequestParam("sampleIds[]")
                                                     List<Long> sampleIds,
                                                     Locale locale)
        Remove a list of samples from a a Project.
        Parameters:
        projectId - Id of the project to remove the samples from
        sampleIds - An array of samples to remove from a project
        locale - The locale of the web browser.
        Returns:
        Map containing either success or errors.

      • ajaxSamplesMerge

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples/merge",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> ajaxSamplesMerge​(@PathVariable
                                                 Long projectId,
                                                 @RequestParam
                                                 Long mergeSampleId,
                                                 @RequestParam("sampleIds[]")
                                                 List<Long> sampleIds,
                                                 @RequestParam
                                                 String sampleName,
                                                 Locale locale)
        Merges a list of samples into either the first sample in the list with a new name if provided, or into the selected sample based on the id.
        Parameters:
        projectId - The id for the current Project
        mergeSampleId - An id for a Sample to merge the other samples into.
        sampleIds - A list of ids for Sample to merge together.
        sampleName - An optional new name for the Sample.
        locale - The Locale of the current user.
        Returns:
        a map of Sample properties representing the merged sample.

      • removeSamplesFromProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{projectId}/ajax/samples/remove",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> removeSamplesFromProject​(@PathVariable
                                                         Long projectId,
                                                         @RequestParam("sampleIds[]")
                                                         List<Long> samples,
                                                         Locale locale)
        Remove the given Samples from the given Project
        Parameters:
        projectId - ID of the project to remove from
        samples - Sample ids to remove
        locale - User's locale
        Returns:
        Map with success message

      • downloadSamples

        @RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/download/files")
public void downloadSamples​(@PathVariable
                            Long projectId,
                            @RequestParam("ids[]")
                            List<Long> ids,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                     throws IOException
        Download a set of sequence files from selected samples within a project
        Parameters:
        projectId - Id for a Project
        ids - List of ids ofr Sample within the project
        response - HttpServletResponse
        Throws:
        IOException - if we fail to read a file from the filesystem.

      • exportProjectSamplesTable

        @RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/samples/export")
public void exportProjectSamplesTable​(@PathVariable
                                      Long projectId,
                                      @RequestParam
                                      DataTablesExportTypes type,
                                      @DataTablesRequest
                                      DataTablesParams params,
                                      @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="")
                                      List<String> sampleNames,
                                      @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="")
                                      List<Long> associated,
                                      UISampleFilter filter,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                      Locale locale)
                               throws IOException
        Export Sample from a Project as either Excel or CSV formatted.
        Parameters:
        projectId - identifier for the current Project
        type - of file to export (.csv or .xlsx)
        params - DataTable parameters.
        sampleNames - List of Sample names the Project is filtered on
        associated - List of acitve associated Project identifiers.
        filter - Sample attribute filters applied.
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        locale - of the current user.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the exported file cannot be written

      • validateNewSampleName

        @RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/validate-sample-name")
@ResponseBody
public boolean validateNewSampleName​(@PathVariable
                                     Long projectId,
                                     @RequestParam
                                     String sampleName)
        Valid the name for a new Sample label. This checks against existing sample names within the current project to ensure that it is not a duplicate. TODO: Remove this after removing merge-modal code.
        Parameters:
        projectId - Identifier for the current project
        sampleName - String name to validate.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if the name is unique.
